QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, oba_todos.id odf_pk, oba_todos.owner as owner, oba_todos.CODE as code, TODO_OWNER.FULL_NAME as owner_name, odf_ca_oba_todo.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_oba_todo.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, oba_todos.due_date as due_date, odf_ca_oba_todo.clr_priority as clr_priority, oba_todos.completed as completed, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, ( CASE WHEN oba_todos.due_date < trunc(current_date) THEN 100 WHEN oba_todos.due_date IS NULL OR oba_todos.due_date > trunc(current_date) + 7 THEN 103 WHEN oba_todos.due_date > trunc(current_date) AND oba_todos.due_date <= trunc(current_date) + 7 THEN 102 WHEN oba_todos.due_date = trunc(current_date) THEN 101 ELSE NULL END ) as due_date_cust_sort, odf_ca_oba_todo.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, oba_todos.blocked as blocked, oba_todos.blocked_reason as blocked_reason, oba_todos.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, oba_todos.link_url as link_url, OBA_TODOS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_oba_todo.partition_code as partition_code, OBA_TODOS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, (CASE WHEN OBA_TODOS.completed =1 THEN '2' ELSE (CASE WHEN OBA_TODOS.blocked = 1 then '1' else '0' END) END) as status, odf_ca_oba_todo.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from oba_todos oba_todos JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON OBA_TODOS.CREATED_BY = CREATED.USER_ID JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON OBA_TODOS.LAST_UPDATED_BY = UPDATED.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN srm_resources TODO_OWNER ON OBA_TODOS.OWNER = TODO_OWNER.ID JOIN odf_ca_oba_todo odf_ca_oba_todo ON odf_ca_oba_todo.id=oba_todos.id where 1 = 1
